text: Slight flooding will occur in Inner Harbour area from 8 pm ~ 0 am due to astronomical tide. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Slight flooding will occur in Inner Harbour area from 8 pm ~ 1 am due to astronomical tide. Cloudy. Rain. Force 4 to 5 easterly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
